title: Finance Change- BA
description:
What impact will you make?




Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. As the undisputed leader in professional services, Deloitte is where you’ll find unrivaled opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.




Deloitte is where you’ll find unrivaled opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.




The Team

Discover the various Financial Risk services, we offer to help organizations across the full life cycle of financial transaction. From governance and processes to technology and reporting, our services can enhance transparency, efficiency, compliance, and financial integrity.







Work you’ll do




Key Responsibilities:




Financial Reporting Expertise:

Lead the development and delivery of financial reporting processes, ensuring accurate and timely reporting in line with regulatory and internal standards.

Support the design and optimization of financial reporting frameworks to enhance efficiency, transparency, and compliance with evolving financial regulations.

Ensure financial reports reflect the true and fair view of the organization's financial position, meeting both internal and external reporting requirements.

Change Management & Business Analysis:

Lead and contribute to complex change initiatives related to ledger implementation and financial reporting.

Provide expertise in business analysis, gathering requirements, conducting impact assessments, and defining solutions to meet business needs.

Support the implementation of regulatory and reporting changes within the finance function, ensuring that all systems and processes are aligned with organizational goals and regulatory demands.

Documentation & Reporting:

Produce comprehensive documentation of business and functional requirements, change specifications, and project deliverables.

Ensure clear and concise documentation of processes, systems changes, and reporting requirements using Microsoft Office and other relevant tools.

Support the preparation of presentations and reports for senior management and stakeholders, ensuring all information is accurate and aligned with financial reporting standards.

Data Analysis & Technical Support:

Use advanced data interrogation skills (SQL, Excel) to analyze large financial data sets, ensuring data integrity and accuracy for reporting purposes.

Provide data-driven insights to support decision-making and enhance the quality of financial reporting outputs.

Collaborate with the technical teams to improve reporting systems, enhancing the ability to process and present financial data more effectively.

Cross-functional Collaboration:

Work closely with global finance teams to ensure seamless delivery of financial reporting initiatives.

Collaborate with other business functions to ensure that changes in financial control and reporting processes are understood and properly integrated into day-to-day operations.




Required Skills & Experience:




Financial Reporting & Change Expertise:

Proven experience in financial reporting and financial change within a global banking or financial services environment.

Strong understanding of financial reporting standards, including regulatory requirements and internal control frameworks.

Experience working on financial reporting systems and processes to ensure accuracy and compliance with both internal and external regulations.

Change Delivery & Business Analysis:

Demonstrated experience in delivering change within the financial reporting function, including project management and stakeholder coordination.

Strong business analysis skills, including requirements gathering, process design, and impact analysis specific to financial reporting changes.

Proven ability to lead or support complex change initiatives, particularly those with cross-functional impacts.

Data Analysis & Technical Proficiency:

Advanced proficiency in SQL and Excel for data analysis and financial reporting purposes.

Strong technical skills for working with large data sets, conducting deep data analysis, and extracting meaningful insights to enhance financial reporting.

Documentation & Reporting Skills:

Excellent documentation and presentation skills, with experience in clearly communicating complex information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

High attention to detail in the creation of reports, business cases, and change specifications.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to liaise effectively with both technical and business teams.




Desired Skills:

Previous experience working in global finance teams on complex financial reporting change initiatives.
Familiarity with regulatory reporting requirements and frameworks specific to financial control and reporting.
Exposure to financial reporting systems and tools used in global banking and financial services.

Education & Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business, Computer Science, or a related field.
Professional certifications or training in financial reporting, business analysis, or project management would be advantageous.







Your role as a leader




At Deloitte India, we believe in the importance of leadership at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose by challenging themselves to identify issues that are most important for our clients, our people, and for society and make an impact that matters.




In addition to living our purpose, Assistant Manager across our organization:




• Builds own understanding of our purpose and values; explores opportunities for impact

•Demonstrates strong commitment to personal learning and development; acts as a brand

ambassador to help attract top talent

• Understands expectations and demonstrates personal accountability for keeping performance on track

• Actively focuses on developing effective communication and relationship-building skills

• Understands how their daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and the business




How you’ll grow




At Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there’s always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help build world-class skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing




business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs at Deloitte University, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career. Explore Deloitte University, The Leadership Centre.
